items.title: Save up to $500 on Aventon’s three popular legacy e-bikes, like the Aventure 2 all-terrain commuter at $1,499
items.summary:
While Aventon may have ended its previous New Year Sale across its entire lineup of e-bikes, the brand is continuing discounts on three of its popular legacy models, like the Aventure 2 All-Terrain e-bike at $1,499 shipped. Normally going for $1,999 outside of sales/discounts, we mostly saw this model kept down at $1,599 throughout most of 2025, with late August being the first time that year that it dipped lower to this rate, which it regularly returned to since. If you missed out or aren’t looking to spend more on the newer smart counterpart, you’re looking at a $500 markdown here to the best price we have tracked over the last year – plus, it beats out 2024’s Black Friday and Christmas pricing while matching the prices we saw in 2025’s seasonal events. Head below to check out the other legacy deals while they are still around.

items.title: Power your 2026 adventures with these compact EcoFlow RIVER power stations + bonus savings – starting from $180
items.summary:
Looking in on EcoFlow’s ongoing New Year Sale, you can currently pick up the popular RIVER 2 Pro Portable Power Station at $322.05 shipped, after using the code 26EFNYAFF at checkout, which beats out Amazon’s pricing by $27. Carrying a $599 MSRP, though usually starting lower at $529 at other marketplaces like Amazon, we’ve been seeing it regularly marked down between $349 and $339 with discounts since October, with this rate only beaten by the $315 and $299 prices that popped up during Black Friday and Christmas sales. While this current sale continues, you’ll be getting $207 off the going rate ($277 off the MSRP) for the third-lowest price we have tracked. Be sure to check out the other RIVER power station deals we’ve gathered below, as well as all the other EcoFlow New Year deals here, complete with bonus savings.

Running parallel to the short-term CGO800S and AGO X flash sale lows, Tenways is continuing its December holiday deal on the new Wayfarer Cruiser e-bike with $366 in FREE gear at $1,899 shipped for an unknown time longer. This all-new commuter only just released at the end of October, when we saw a $300 launch discount from its $2,199 tag price and only getting a $277 bundle that included mudguards, a kickstand, and a rear carrier. This bundle deal, which happens to be an extended best so far during its time on the market, gives you an additional larger pannier bag on top of that previously mentioned gear and discounts, keeping things at the all-time lowest price we have tracked and the best bundle to date – all so you can score the most to start off the new year strong.
